_comment: Set VLLM_ENABLED=true to use Qwen2.5-32B-Instruct-AWQ (pre-quantized) via vLLM; otherwise defaults to Mistral-7B+adapters

synthesizer.notes: Uses ModelStore adapter mistral_synth_v1 (or qwen2_synth_v1 if VLLM_ENABLED=true)

re_ranker.notes: Uses ModelStore adapter mistral_re_ranker_v1 (or qwen2_re_ranker_v1 if VLLM_ENABLED=true)

fact_checker.notes: Uses ModelStore adapter mistral_fact_checker_v1 (or qwen2_fact_checker_v1 if VLLM_ENABLED=true)

critic.notes: Uses ModelStore adapter mistral_critic_v1 (or qwen2_critic_v1 if VLLM_ENABLED=true)

journalist.notes: Uses ModelStore adapter mistral_journalist_v1 (or qwen2_journalist_v1 if VLLM_ENABLED=true)

chief_editor.notes: Uses ModelStore adapter mistral_chief_editor_v1 (or qwen2_chief_editor_v1 if VLLM_ENABLED=true)

reasoning.notes: Uses ModelStore adapter mistral_reasoning_v1 (or qwen2_reasoning_v1 if VLLM_ENABLED=true)

analyst.notes: Uses ModelStore adapter mistral_analyst_v1 (or qwen2_analyst_v1 if VLLM_ENABLED=true)
